title: GTA Online
headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Double Rewards on Original Heists
content:
Los Santos is a hustler’s paradise with countless avenues to riches — but few schemes top the thrills of the OG Heists. Crack The Fleeca Job, bust a mad professor out in The Prison Break, secure intel in The Humane Labs Raid, move contraband in Series A Funding, and take on The Pacific Standard Job for 2X GTA$ and RP this week.

Completing any two Heist Finales this week will fulfill the Weekly Challenge and get you an additional bonus of GTA$100,000.
